original_title: FTZMA new Ex-Co meets BOI Chairman
original_body_lines: Newly elected office bearers of Free Trade Zone Manufacturers’ Association (FTZMA) paid a courtesy call on BOI Chairman Dinesh Weerakkody at his office on 21 April 2023. The purpose of the meeting was to bring in the attention of BOI Chairman for current challenges that investors are facing and also to explore opportunities for improving existing policies and regulations to ease of doing business for the export sector ensuring an export-led economy. The delegation consisted of the FTZMA Chairman Dhammika Fernando, General Secretary Sean Umagiliya, Deputy Secretary Tyrone Weckasnighe, Deputy Treasurer Manjula Mahadanaarachchi, Engineer Lalith Kahatapitiya and Secretary General Vasantha Dias
